network

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Client side of the network Handle connection with server as well as manager message sending and receiving. Client has connect to Gui for updating information of Gui

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Client.MessagesFromServerListener
      A runnable class used to listen and receive message from server .

        public void setController(Controller controller)
        Link this client to it's Gui

      • run

        public void run()
        Start this client. Create new connection from this client to server. prepare output and input stream to send and receive message from server. Start a new Thread to listen to the server
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
